title: "Lending a Hand: Printing Infinite Possibility"
description: Raul Leclair is a student at the American Nicaraguan School interested in studying biomedical engineering. His passion has led him to create a Robotics Club whose objective is to design and manufacture robots that address pressing problems in the communities. He hopes to one day be able to develop his passion and create the next big thing in the world of medical engineering: affordable prosthetics for his countrymen.  The reason he became involved with TEDx to spread the idea of curiosity to others and aid them in the development of their ideas that might one day help their community.
author: Raúl
